meta_title: SafeWork NSW Maintenance Compliance: The 2026 Guide & Checklist
meta_description: Master WHS Regulation 2017 Chapter 5 requirements. Learn PCBU obligations, Reg 213 audits, and how Factory AI automates maintenance compliance in NSW.
title: SafeWork NSW Maintenance Compliance Requirements: The Definitive 2026 Guide for PCBUs

hero_image.alt: Hero image for SafeWork NSW Maintenance Compliance Requirements: The Definitive 2026 Guide for PCBUs

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-quality hero image of a modern Australian manufacturing facility. The scene features a diverse group of maintenance engineers and safety officers (men and women) wearing standard Australian PPE: hard hats, high-visibility yellow/orange vests with reflective strips, and safety glasses. One engineer is inspecting a large industrial motor or conveyor system, while another stands nearby holding a tablet (back of device visible only) referencing data. The environment is clean but industrial (brownfield style), with visible pipes, yellow safety walkways, and machinery. The lighting is professional and bright, emphasizing safety and technology. No text or overlays in the image.
